{"step_by_step_thinking": "Heavy and light body impression materials are types of dental impression materials used to create a detailed replica of the patient's teeth and gums. These materials are typically made from silicone or polyether. Mercaptan is a type of rubber base impression material, but it's not typically classified as heavy or light body. Reversible hydrocolloid is also a type of impression material, but it's not typically classified as heavy or light body.", "answer_choice": "B. Silicone"}
